products.name: Vintage Typewriter
products.review: This typewriter looks good in your living room.

products.name: Vintage Typewriter
products.review: I bought this typewriter for my son. Todays keyboards just don't teach the necessary finger strength a man must learn to survive! Everytime I hear him trembling his fingers on the table like droplets of warm goat poop falling on a bed of grass I can't help but think to myself: How could those feeble hands ever win a negotiation? Luckily I came across this vintage typewriter requiring a minimum of 15 Newtonmeters of force before a letter is typed. Ever since forcing him to four hours of daily uninterrupted typewriter-typing I got to watch his fingers swell in force, as did his manlihood. Unfortunately some of the colour is flaking off, but definitely worth the purchase!

products.name: Vintage Camera Lens
